name: 6ood Friend Quest
description:
Save your GOOD FRIEND from HELL in a VERY SHORT ADVENTURE!

Also she's a demon!

Just about everyone's a demon!

That's how hell  probably works!

This is a single level game originally made in 7 days for the Trans Gal Jam 2022, had to take an extra day because of build issues and missed the deadline but still putting it out there!

(This was my first time doing a jam by myself and I'm not exactly a programmer so beware of POTENTIAL BUGS horrible HORRIBLE bugs oh god )
